page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW _ CLEE HILL
page.content: The area under study is one of scenic beauty, and includes the villages of{Clee Hill, Knowbury}and{ {Hope Bagot.}The village of{Clee Hill} is built around the junction of the A.4117 and the B.4214. It has shops, a Post office, public houses, a church, a garage, a Doctor's Surgery, a village hall, a cafe, a Police house, a recreation ground, a hairdressers and a Primary School. The population of Caynham Parish, which includes{Clee Hill}and{Knowbury, is approximately 1,113.{Knowbury}has a church, a village hall, 2 public houses, a Post office and a shop. {Hope Bagot}has a population of approximately 48. It has a public house, a village hall and a church. This is a strong agricutural community. The landscape is mainly farmland with some moor_land.
